name: unworldly
content:
unworldly adjective
(NOT PRACTICAL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
not practical, or without a lot of experience of life: There was something slightly unworldly about him. We observe her transformation from a naive, unworldly girl to a dignified adult woman.
More examplesFewer examplesThey had been too innocent and unworldly to try and run away until it was too late.They led an unworldly life and constructed some of the country's finest Buddhist temples.

unworldly adjective
(NOT NORMAL)
not relating to physical things or ordinary daily life in this world or on this planet : At times, the actors look unworldly, like ghosts in a dreamscape. The vessel looked like an unworldly cross between a spacecraft and a yacht.
More examplesFewer examplesQuantum computing has some of the unworldly weirdness of quantum mechanics.
